name: MOHAMED
about_content: Hello there, I'm so happy you are here! (:
My name is Mohammed Shaaban, I'm 20 and a third-year computer science student based in Menof. I have a strong passion for the technologies related to the Frontend,Backend and UX.

Junior Frontend Developer with 1+ years of experience designing and building responsive web design. Proficient with React and Node Frameworks. Passionate about learning and development with a desire to apply skills on a larger development team. Eager to tackle more complex problems and continue to find ways to maximize user efficiency

skill.title: HTML
skill.description: I have a strong command of HTML for organizing web pages and generating meaningful content that can be accessed by all users.

skill.title: CSS
skill.description: I possess expertise in utilizing CSS to design web pages and craft visually captivating layouts that enhance the overall user experience.

skill.title: JavaScript
skill.description: I have substantial experience in employing JavaScript to introduce interactivity and functionality into web pages, resulting in dynamic user interfaces.

skill.title: React
skill.description: I am well-versed in React, proficient in creating reusable components and managing application state using hooks and context.

skill.title: Java
skill.description: I have extensive utilizing Java for object-oriented programming (OOP).

skill.title: Git
skill.description: I am proficient in Git, managing code changes, collaborating with others, and resolving conflicts effectively.

skill.title: GitHub
skill.description: I am skilled in using GitHub for seamless project collaboration, code sharing, and issue tracking. Through GitHub, I efficiently create and manage repositories and effectively present my work to potential employers.

skill.title: Vite
skill.description: I have gained considerable experience working with Vite for approximately six months, leveraging its capabilities to build React websites and seamlessly deploy them on platforms like Netlify.

skill.title: Node
skill.description: When it comes to building web applications, I prefer using Node as my runtime environment over Yarn. I have expertise in leveraging Node.js to develop powerful and scalable web applications.
